attributes.action: Stop Hostility in Nigeria Targeting Christians
attributes.additional_details:
Dear  Minister,
The burning alive , torture and murder has pursue the  Nigeria Christians women,  children and men wherever they are in the north of Nigeria. World leaders must unite now to end the killing, maiming and burning of Churches in northern Nigeria and establish a lasting peace in Nigeria.

I therefore ask you to:
Make ending the violence against Christians in northern Nigeria one of your top priorities.
1.Exert Pressure on the Nigeria Government to respond to the request of the people by convening a   national conference to determine whether Christians and Muslims should continue to live together.
2.Declare the Muslim extremist military wing Boko Haram a terrorist organisation
3.Stop the deployment of Christian Youth Coppers to the north of Nigeria
4.Increase humanitarian support to person(s)/families traumatized by terror.

Thank you for your leadership on this urgent matter.
